tuv.seg: Administration of government departments
Riarachán na ranna rialtais
Each minister of the Government is responsible for running and managing the department they have been allocated
Tá freagracht maidir le riarachán agus bainistiú na Roinne atá faoina c(h)úram ar an Aire atá i gceannas na Roinne sin
There are 16 government departments
Tá iomlán 16 ranna rialtais
You can find out about government spending in each of these departments on whereyourmoneygoes.gov.ie
Chomh maith leis an Aire comh-aireachta atá i gceannas na Roinne is minic go mbíonn Aire Stáit freisin ag an Roinn
Each department employs a large number of civil servants, including a Secretary General, who remain in their positions regardless of changes in the Government
Tá líon mór Státseirbhísí ag obair sa Roinn, san áireamh tá Ard Rúnaí, a fhanann ina bpost fiú le athrú Rialtais
These officials advise and assist the minister in the running of the department
Cuireann na hoifigigh seo comhairle ar an Aire agus tugann siad cúnamh dó/dí an Roinn a riaradh
The minister may suggest and propose new or amended legislation to the Government relating to matters that arise in their department
Is féidir leis an Aire a mholadh go ndéanfaí reachtú nua a chuir i bhfeidhm nó dlí a bhí ann cheana a leasú atá bainteach lena Roinn féin
Ministers also have a power to make Statutory Instruments which are also known as delegated or secondary legislation
Tá sé de chumhacht ag Airí Ionstraim Reachtúla a dhéanamh. Tugtar Fo-reachtú orthu seo freisin
Statutory Instruments allow the minister to give effect to or implement legislation without the need to have every detail passed by the Oireachtas
Tugann Ionstraim Reachtúla an deis don Aire an dlí a chuir i bhfeidhm gan gach gné de a bheith glactha ag an Oireachtas
Statutory Instruments do not have to be approved by the Oireachtas, although they may be cancelled by either House
Ní gá do Ionstraim Reachtúla a bheith ceadaithe ag an Oireachtas cé gur féidir le ceachtar den dá theach iad a chuir ar ceal
You can view all Irish Government legislation from 1922 onwards
Féach iomlán reachtaíocht Rialtais na hÉireann ó 1922
Code of practice on accessibility of public services and information provided by public bodies
Cód cleachtais ar inrochtaineacht seirbhísí poiblí agus faisnéise a chuireann comhlachtaí poiblí ar fáil
The Disability Act 2005 provides a statutory basis for accessible public services
Cuireann an tAcht um Míchumas 2005 bunús reachtúil ar fáil i gcomhair seirbhísí poiblí inrochtana
Sections 26, 27 and 28 of the Act place obligations on public bodies to make their services and information accessible to people with disabilities
Cuireann Ailt 26, 27 agus 28 den Acht oibleagáidí ar chomhlachtaí poiblí rochtain ar bheith ar fáil do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas ar a gcuid seirbhísí agus a gcuid faisnéise

The Department of Justice and Equality charged the National Disability Authority (NDA) with developing a Code of practice on accessibility of public services and information provided by public bodies as set out under Section 30 of the Act

Tá an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt, agus Comhionannais tar éis an cúram a chur ar an Údarás Náisiúnta Míchumais a fhorbairt Cód cleachtais ar inrochtaineacht seirbhísí poiblí agus faisnéise a chuireann comhlachtaí poiblí ar fáil (pdf)
The purpose of this Code is to guide public bodies to meet their obligations under the Act
Is í an aidhm atá ag an gCód seo ná comhlachtaí poiblí a threorú chun a gcuid oibleagáidí a chomhlíonadh faoin Acht
The Code covers a wide range of services provided by public bodies - including the provision of information, information resources, schemes, allowances or other benefits administered by public bodies

Clúdaíonn an Cód réimse leathan seirbhísí a chuireann comhlachtaí poiblí ar fáil - lena n-áirítear soláthar faisnéise, acmhainní faisnéise, scéimeanna, liúntais nó sochair eile arna reáchtáil ag comhlachtaí poiblí
